text: Noah Hawley (born ) is an American television writer and producer, screenwriter, and bestselling author. He created and wrote the FX television series Fargo (2014–present) and Legion (2017–2019). ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:American novelists
title: Noah Hawley
